Phobia listened to the battle with great interest, "KitKat is doing 
quite well for such a wimp." he thought remembering the body in the 
CR chamber he proceeded to the back, removed it and started scanning 
for useful parts. "Energeon relays, audio and video scanners can be 
fixxed, I'll need one of these" The spider cannibalizes all the 
possible functional parts and places them in a crate with numerous 
other spare parts.

He sets a course for the escaping maximals with the intent of 
intercepting them.(Rizopas and co.)

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::KitKat::
> 
> She smlied as Drillbit came to her and picked her up. She was glad 
he 
> was unhurt.  She closed her eyes as she was put into the CR chamber 
> and passed out in the CR.
